__e: A flotilla of ships was invisible to their disbelieving eyes.
Somebody has a new fleet of warships.
There's a fleet of ships out there.
Yes. A fleet of trucks, so we can take it all.
It looks fine on paper, but that's not a paper fleet out there.
I'd like to think there's still something positive in the life of a starship captain these days.
Our pursuit of this fleet of yours was another error.
The proof is that our fleet survives.
Oh his fleet is right where it should be,
Did you always want to be a starship captain?
It's just that... ever since I was a child, I've known exactly what I wanted to do.
I wanted to give something back in return for all that Starfleet has given me.
And you're not like any Starfleet officer I've ever met.
The fleet you sent for is still on its way.
Except they have a big fleet. A fleet 20 times bigger than ours.
DESRON is ready for tasking, sir.
We heard your message, too, and well, the fleet's in.
Our fleet is nothing compared to theirs.

At least until the rest of their battle fleet gets here.
